## Environment

| Field | Details |
|---|---|
| macOS Version | e.g. macOS 14.4 Sonoma |
| macOS Build | e.g. 23E214 (from `sw_vers`) |
| Mac Model | e.g. MacBook Pro M3, 2024 |
| Chip | Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3/M4) / Intel |
| Shell | e.g. Bash 3.2 / Zsh (run `echo $SHELL`) |
| WiFi interface detected | e.g. en0 / not detected |
| `airport` utility found | Yes / No / Unknown |
| sudo prompt accepted | Yes / No |
| VPN active during run | Yes / No — if yes, which VPN? |
